speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the duration of your symptoms - when did they start and how long have you been experiencing fatigue, abdominal pain, night sweats, and weight loss?

text: "About a month ago, I started feeling really tired all the time, and it's been getting worse. My abdominal pain has been bothering me for about 4 weeks now, and it's not just a sharp pain, it's more of a dull ache. The night sweats started about 3 weeks ago, and I've lost about 5.4 kg in that time, which is really concerning for me."

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the nature of your abdominal pain? Is it constant, or does it come and go?

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about your work and daily activities - are you exposed to anything that might be causing your symptoms, such as chemicals, heavy lifting, or prolonged sitting? Also, have you noticed any other symptoms such as fever, cough, or difficulty swallowing?

text: "I work in a construction company, so I'm on my feet all day, lifting heavy materials and working with power tools. speaker: Doctor
text: "Can you tell me more about your diet - have you noticed any changes in what you're eating or drinking, or any foods that might trigger or alleviate your symptoms?" text: "Ah, my diet? I've been eating pretty standard stuff, you know, burgers, pizza, pasta... nothing out of the ordinary.
